extension_brief_description.message: Receive your Facebook notifications instantly in your browser, beautify your Facebook posts, play with status sizes and more.

about_description.message: Facefont is made with ❤, with the hope to make better your daily usage of Facebook.

about_bug_found.message: Found a bug ? Cool! You can quickly report to the below email address, I will hasten to correct ;-)

make_donation.message: If you like my work and want to encourage me, your donation will be very appreciated

text_questions.message: For any question or bug report, feel free to contact me:

options_header_description.message: Beautify your Facebook posts, receive your notifications instantly in your browser, and more.

label_popup_make_donation.message: You like Facefont ? Buy a ☕ to the developer!

popup_fonts_help.message: These will be applied to Facebook posts

label_textSize.message: Change the text size (14 by default):

label_textpreview.message: Don't trust anything you see. Even salt look like sugar

label_enablesmileysTA.message: Propose me smileys when I write a Facebook status

notifications_description.message: If you activate this, you will be instantly notified when you'll receive a notification on Facebook

label_please_refresh.message: Please refresh Facebook page to apply changes.

msgRefresh.message: Please refresh Facebook page to apply smiley disabling.

msgRefreshGeneric.message: Please refresh Facebook page to apply changes.

msgToolsFF.message: You can find FaceFont here : Tools menu --> FaceFont

TOAST_MESSAGE_SMILEY_COPIED.message: Now just paste it (Ctrl+V) in your status.
